entity.name: Hong Kong declares coronavirus outbreak an 'emergency'
entity.description: The city’s leader, Carrie Lam, also extended school holidays until February 17, suspended official visits to mainland China and said this year’s Hong Kong Marathon would not take place.

text: @MarkRuffalo @realDonaldTrump You're right...it should be called the Wuhan virus.  But I'm guessing you didn't cry about Australian bat virus...or ebola (ebola reservoir), Hong Kong flu, Spanish flu, ect.  You should stick to acting and leave the politics to the big kids.  Do smarter.
